knimeNode.name: Read OMERO ROI
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads all the ROIs of an image from an OMERO Server

fullDescription.intro: This node allows you to read the ROIs attached to an image from an OMERO Server.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The ImageID of the image from which the attached rois will be read.

ports.inPort: Connection Information to the server (from OMERO Connection node).
ports.outPort: The ROIs read from the OMERO Server.
